findings.rationale: The confidentiality obligations only last for two years, which may expose sensitive information if the relationship continues beyond this period.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.rationale: The clause allows the use of confidential information for evaluating business opportunities, which may lead to misuse if not clearly defined.
findings.evidence_quote: Not use the information for any purpose other than evaluating business opportunities.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Detail on Return or Destruction
findings.rationale: The agreement mentions the return or destruction of confidential information but does not specify the process or timeline for this action.
findings.evidence_quote: Return or destroy all Confidential Information upon request.
